I SOLVED MY PROBLEM. Intructions:

1.Install sims 2 (i download from here)
2. Update your sims
3. DONT crack it
4. Install sims university
5. After it completes, mount cd4 for the update
6. The update COMPLETES
7. Crack the sims 2 (copy the sims2.exe first and paste it somewhere in your documents, in case that you need to install other expansions)
7. Download the keygen from above, crack: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3386216/The_Sims_2_University_-_Crack
8. Mount it, (only open this file blh-ts2u1.mds)
9. Go to your sims icon, doesnt matter if its sims2 or university
10. Play the game!


Hope it works, it worked for me, and DO NOT LOOSE UR FIRDT SIMS2.EXE file! you could need it after, i have to install nightlife then... ANY PROBLEM U TELL ME, bye bye.
